Images to Download from Your Wix Site

How to Download from Wix

  1. Log into your Wix editor
  2. Go to the Media Manager (left sidebar)
  3. Search for each image by filename or description
  4. Download the original/highest quality version

Image List

Recommended Folder Structure

Once downloaded, organize them as:

assets/
  images/
    hero-background.jpg
    bill-tubbs-photo.jpg
    services/
      data-analytics.jpg
      process-control.jpg
      energy-management.jpg
      production-optimization.jpg
      management-control.jpg
    testimonials/
      icon-oil-gas.gif
      icon-mine.gif
    icons/
      linkedin.png

Alternative: Use Similar Stock Images

If you don’t have access to the Wix media manager, you could also source similar professional stock images from:

  • Unsplash (free, high quality): https://unsplash.com
  • Pexels (free): https://pexels.com
  • Pixabay (free): https://pixabay.com

Search terms:

  • “industrial control room”
  • “business data analytics”
  • “manufacturing facility”
  • “business meeting professional”
  • “industrial graphs charts”

Total Images Needed

  • 10 total images (7 photos + 3 icons)
  • Estimated total size: ~5-10 MB
  • All should be web-optimized (ideally under 500KB each)
